page.title: 12MUGDOCK COUNTRY PARK
page.content: Craigend Castle also needs repairing. The stables near this castle are going to be converted into a visitor centre and every body interested in the park is looking forward to this. On the top of the hill you can see over into the valley of the Clyde. Here there is a second World War gun site .The guns have gone but the stands where they were are still there.They helped protect Clydebank from the German planes but did not shoot down any. The country park gives employment to young people who work in the park grounds and also the rangers and stone mason.It is a nice place to go for the day for all the people who live in the Glasgow area.
